description: Nana is living at Kouta`s place and trying to find her place. She doesn`t seem to want to do anything in the household while Nyuu is the girl who can do everything. Anything Nana tries usually results in bloodshed. Finally she storms out of the place and runs into Robocop Bandou. He devises a plan to capture Lucy, only if Nana can get her alone...

titles.title: In Passing Showers: Or, "Just How Did the Young Girl Arrive at Those Feelings?" - Regenschauer
Przelotny deszcz: Bądź też jak to dziewczyna podejmuje decyzję.
Tooriame nite: Arui wa, Shoujo wa Ikani Shite Sono Shinjou ni Itatta ka?
通り雨にて 或いは, 少女はいかにしてその心情に至ったか? REGENSCHAUER
